game.name: Shield of Breaker
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Shield of Breaker is a single-player Action-RPG set in a fantasy world. Protect your castle from endless waves of enemies and turn the tide of battle by deflecting their own blazing fireballs. Choose your hero, upgrade your powers,. Each victory unlocks your path to defend new lands in your realm.
